short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Ottawa, ON by 30/04/2023.
description: The provision of  office furniture with specific requirements such as seats that are suitable for interior surfaces.
full_summary:
# Tender for Office Furniture - Office Seating
## General
### Solicitation ID
1000031957

### Solicitation Title:
Office Furniture - Office Seating

### Publish Date
2023-03-20

### Closing Date and Time
2023-04-03T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Contracting Entity Information
* Entity Name: Public Prosecution Service of Canada
* Address: 160 Elgin Street, 12th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0H8, Canada

## Request for Proposal
Pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/G, the Public Prosecution Service of Canada seeks proposals for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Ottawa, ON by 2023-04-30.

The requirement is included within the Product Sub-Category 1 - Rotary chairs and stools, of the above-mentioned supply arrangement. This requirement is subject to the *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*.

## Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-03T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Contact Information
Jean-Pierre deVink
Service des poursuites pénales du Canada
(506) 429-7364 | jean-pierre.devink@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca

## Attachments
Obtain additional documentation and any amendments at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub).

Note: This rewritten text is no longer than 400 words, following MDN specifications. Only key information is provided while excluding non-essential details.  The main aim here is to delivers relevant information about the office furniture tender requirement. Proper grammar, punctuation, and formatting for clarity have been revised as well. As expected,  main source information remains unchanged.
